game.name: Soundpad
game.shortDescription: 고품질로 음성 채팅에서 사운드를 재생하세요. 다른 사람들이 들을 수 있도록 마이크 신호에 사운드 또는 음악을 추가하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Play sounds in voice chats in high digital quality. Add sounds or music to your microphone signal so others will hear it, too.

reviewHighlights.text: Soundpad is not a game, it’s a weapon of social destruction. The countless insane moments we had with trolling in Csgo were worth every cent.
as a pro ragebaiter and a pro troll i love this. this was the best $4.99 of my life even tho if i press any key I'll accidentally play a sound that i...
